column2:
"It's been a long time!
Even after 2 years, ARKS No.1 Info Dealers,
the twin sisters, Patty and Tea!"

"That said, we've bumped into
each other a bunch in the city.
It's too late for a greeting."

"Today, just for you, we have
this special piece of intel."

"Surprise, surprise...
We've had made contact with a
suspicious ARKS before everyone else!"

"Though, not really a
suspicious ARKS anymore, since
we know they're from Earth."
"But, back then, when you wereinteraction with someone from Earth."

"To be honest, I was already
questioning of their nature
back then."

"No matter how many times we've
tried to talk to them, they've
just stood there, with a stupid
look on their faces."

"That just happened, because Patty
kept talking and talking. In-fact,
that happens with everyone."

"That's not true! This person here
listens to me very well! Right? Right?"
"1. Yes, of course..."
"See? Of course!"

"I don't know...
that sounded like half-hearted reply."
"Hey, \"Yeah!\""
"...That was a long pause."

"It's totally worth being an
info dealer when you have
people that listen to you."

"Well, as you can see.
We're the same as always."

"So Patty, did you figure anything
out or have any leads on where we
should report, as a result from
interacting with that Earthling?"

"Eh? Uhhh, let me see...
Honestly, there weren't that many
differences between us. We can't
tell them apart either."

"Well, yeah... Patty is
likely not thinking this,
but that statement has a good point."

"An avatar that is a perfect copy.
That was apparently the conclusion
from ARKS' analysis."

"Which is why, recently, ARKS has
started a steady screening process.
In other words, a thorough search!"

"Even if they fall though the cracks,
they show undeniable odd traits when
dealt through directly."

"If you think of it this way...
maybe Patty's unrelenting interactions
aren't completely useless after all."

"Going through before anyone else,
and collecting intel! That is the
goal of an information dealer!"

"We look forward to working with you
again soon."
